languages.text: "Трон побери, за что столь мучительное испытание свалилось на наши головы?" {n}Джай почти воет от отчаяния.{/n} "Столько драгоценного времени потеряно, а мы продвинулись лишь на три номера! Такими темпами мы с вами скорей состаримся, шерин".

traits.locale_text: "Трон побери, за что столь мучительное испытание свалилось на наши головы?" {n}Джай почти взвывает от отчаяния.{/n} "Столько драгоценного времени потеряно, а мы продвинулись лишь на три номера! Такими темпами мы с вами скорей состаримся, шерин".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Throne take me, what torturous trial have we let ourselves in for?" {n}Jae almost wails in despair.{/n} "So much precious time lost, and we've only moved three places ahead! At this rate, we'll be old and grey before we get out of this queue, shereen."
languages.original_text: "Трон побери, за что столь мучительное испытание свалилось на наши головы?" {n}Джай почти воет от отчаяния.{/n} "Столько драгоценного времени потеряно, а мы продвинулись лишь на три номера! Такими темпами мы с вами скорей состаримся, шерин".

traits.locale_text: "Throne take me, what torturous trial have we let ourselves in for?" {n}Jae almost wails in despair.{/n} "So much precious time lost, and we've only moved three places ahead! At this rate, we'll be old and grey before we get out of this queue, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Throne take me, what torturous trial have we let ourselves in for?" {n}Jae almost wails in despair.{/n} "So much precious time lost, and we've only moved three places ahead! At this rate, we'll be old and grey before we get out of this queue, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Throne take me, what torturous trial have we let ourselves in for?" {n}Jae almost wails in despair.{/n} "So much precious time lost, and we've only moved three places ahead! At this rate, we'll be old and grey before we get out of this queue, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Throne take me, what torturous trial have we let ourselves in for?" {n}Jae almost wails in despair.{/n} "So much precious time lost, and we've only moved three places ahead! At this rate, we'll be old and grey before we get out of this queue, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “让黄金王座带走我吧，这到底是什么样的折磨啊？”{n}婕伊几乎发出了绝望的哀嚎。{/n}“我们浪费了这么多宝贵的时间，却仅仅前进了三个位置。恐怕还没等咱们排完队，咱们就要变得老态龙钟了，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, what torturous trial have we let ourselves in for?" {n}Jae almost wails in despair.{/n} "So much precious time lost, and we've only moved three places ahead! At this rate, we'll be old and grey before we get out of this queue, shereen."

traits.locale_text: “让黄金王座带走我吧，这到底是什么样的折磨啊？”{n}婕伊几乎发出了绝望的哀嚎。{/n}“我们浪费了这么多宝贵的时间，却仅仅前进了三个位置。恐怕还没等咱们排完队，咱们就要变得老态龙钟了，亲爱的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Que el Trono me lleve, ¿a qué ardua prueba nos hemos sometido?». {n}Jae casi aúlla de desesperación.{/n} «¡Hemos perdido ya muchísimo tiempo y solo hemos avanzado tres puestos! A este paso, nos haremos viej{mf|o|a}s antes de llegar al final, shereen».
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, what torturous trial have we let ourselves in for?" {n}Jae almost wails in despair.{/n} "So much precious time lost, and we've only moved three places ahead! At this rate, we'll be old and grey before we get out of this queue, shereen."

traits.locale_text: «Que el Trono me lleve, ¿a qué ardua prueba nos hemos sometido?». {n}Jae casi aúlla de desesperación.{/n} «¡Hemos perdido ya muchísimo tiempo y solo hemos avanzado tres puestos! A este paso, nos haremos viej{mf|o|a}s antes de llegar al final, shereen».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「なんてことかしら、拷問みたいな試練に巻き込まれるだなんて」{n}ジェイは落胆して悲嘆に暮れていると言ってもいい。{/n}「3か所回っただけなの、貴重な時間をこんなに費やすなんて！この調子だと、列を離れるころにはよぼよぼの白髪頭になってしまうわ、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, what torturous trial have we let ourselves in for?" {n}Jae almost wails in despair.{/n} "So much precious time lost, and we've only moved three places ahead! At this rate, we'll be old and grey before we get out of this queue, shereen."

traits.locale_text: 「なんてことかしら、拷問みたいな試練に巻き込まれるだなんて」{n}ジェイは落胆して悲嘆に暮れていると言ってもいい。{/n}「3か所回っただけなの、貴重な時間をこんなに費やすなんて！この調子だと、列を離れるころにはよぼよぼの白髪頭になってしまうわ、シャリーン」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Le Trône m'emporte, dans quel calvaire interminable nous sommes-nous embarqués ? {n}déplore Jae d'un ton désespéré.{/n} Tout ce précieux temps perdu, et nous n'avons encore gagné que trois places ! À ce rythme, nous aurons les dents sèches avant d'en voir le bout, shereen. »
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, what torturous trial have we let ourselves in for?" {n}Jae almost wails in despair.{/n} "So much precious time lost, and we've only moved three places ahead! At this rate, we'll be old and grey before we get out of this queue, shereen."

traits.locale_text: « Le Trône m'emporte, dans quel calvaire interminable nous sommes-nous embarqués ? {n}déplore Jae d'un ton désespéré.{/n} Tout ce précieux temps perdu, et nous n'avons encore gagné que trois places ! À ce rythme, nous aurons les dents sèches avant d'en voir le bout, shereen. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Der Thron hole mich, auf was für eine Folterprüfung haben wir uns da eingelassen?" {n}Jae weint fast vor Verzweiflung.{/n} "So viel wertvolle Zeit verloren, und wir sind nur drei Plätze vorangekommen! In dem Tempo sind wir alt und grau, bis wir diese Schlange hinter uns haben, Shereen."
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, what torturous trial have we let ourselves in for?" {n}Jae almost wails in despair.{/n} "So much precious time lost, and we've only moved three places ahead! At this rate, we'll be old and grey before we get out of this queue, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Der Thron hole mich, auf was für eine Folterprüfung haben wir uns da eingelassen?" {n}Jae weint fast vor Verzweiflung.{/n} "So viel wertvolle Zeit verloren, und wir sind nur drei Plätze vorangekommen! In dem Tempo sind wir alt und grau, bis wir diese Schlange hinter uns haben, Shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Taht alsın canımı, bu nasıl ızdıraplı bir sınavdır böyle?" {n}Jae neredeyse ümitsizlik içinde feryat edecek gibi duruyor.{/n} "Kıymetli vaktimizi çok harcadık, hem de sadece üç sıra ilerledik! Böyle giderse bu kuyruğun başına gelene kadar ihtiyarlamış oluruz be şirinim."
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, what torturous trial have we let ourselves in for?" {n}Jae almost wails in despair.{/n} "So much precious time lost, and we've only moved three places ahead! At this rate, we'll be old and grey before we get out of this queue, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Taht alsın canımı, bu nasıl ızdıraplı bir sınavdır böyle?" {n}Jae neredeyse ümitsizlik içinde feryat edecek gibi duruyor.{/n} "Kıymetli vaktimizi çok harcadık, hem de sadece üç sıra ilerledik! Böyle giderse bu kuyruğun başına gelene kadar ihtiyarlamış oluruz be şirinim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
